attributes.action: Standardise the age limits for all activities as being 16.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that children become adults at 16, and should be treated as such. All activities, including watching films,smoking, drinking, having sexual intercourse and driving should be legal for 16 year olds.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
